description: [``botocore``] This release adds root squash support to FSx for Lustre to restrict root level access from clients by mapping root users to a less-privileged user/group with limited permissions.
[``botocore``] Adding AthenaSourceConfig for MetricSet APIs to support Athena as a data source.

[``botocore``] VoiceID will now automatically expire Speakers if they haven't been accessed for Enrollment, Re-enrollment or Successful Auth for three years. The Speaker APIs now return a "LastAccessedAt" time for Speakers, and the EvaluateSession API returns "SPEAKER_EXPIRED" Auth Decision for EXPIRED Speakers.
[``botocore``] Add a new parameter statusReason to DescribeStackSetOperation output for additional details
[``botocore``] Documentation updates for Amazon API Gateway
[``botocore``] Amazon SageMaker Autopilot adds support for manually selecting features from the input dataset using the CreateAutoMLJob API.
